subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Steelers’ starting offensive center, Maurkice Pouncey, who was overlooked in the voting, was described by his coach as the best first-year player he has ever been around.
snippet: The Pittsburgh Steelers’ starting offensive center, Maurkice Pouncey, who was overlooked in the voting, was described by his coach as the best first-year player he has ever been around.
